Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: crash crazy
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone after using a Razr for years.  I just wanted something to simply talk and occasionally text with.  There are not that many phones out today where youdon't need the internet package, but this phone is great.  The color is great and you can change the lights on the end of it to about 6 different colors.  The menu is very easy to understand and it's organized very well.  The screen is very clear and bright and I love the different themes and pics that come with the phone.  I highly recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Ibutsu
Reviews.Content: I am a big fan of this phone. It is pretty quick and nice looking. It runs just about any java app/game that doesn't use features this phone doesn't have. One underrated feature of this phone is the flip over silence. I love that. When you get a call and see a name/number you don't know/like/etc, just flip the phone over to where it is face down and it automatically silences the phone. The LED lights on this phone are a nice touch. The only bad things I have to say about this is that it doesn't play gif files as animated backgrounds and I can't find anymore to download. The other is that the video files must be a certain type (you can easily use the free program Format Factory to get them into that though) and within a certain resolution to play, over wise you get some error or another. Picture quality is pretty good for the price and video quality is fair but it only does low resolutions. Overall I really like this phone a LOT more than my old crappy, annoying, sidekick lx.

Reviews.Title: LG DLite
Reviews.Author: softtofurox
Reviews.Content: Good. The product came a day earlier than the expected arrival date. Phone in good condition with all the accessories. Using it with an at&t; sim card and it works perfectly. The secret lighting is awesome since you can customize it for each person. Calls are clear and texting (T9) takes time to get used to if you were previously using a touchscreen keyboard. The only thing is I cannot figure out is how to set up the internet and picture messaging, so beware if you want picture messaging. Otherwise, this phone is excellent if you don't need all the features of a smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Very un-happy about the battery
Reviews.Author: Happy and Lucky
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone after using a Samsung for years. I just wanted something to simply talk and occasionally text with. There are not that many phones out today where you don't need the internet package, but this phone is great.  The color is nice and the screen is very clear and bright and I love the different themes and pics that come with the phone. However, battery is not what it says on the specs: Up to 5.5 hours of talk time, up to 360 hours (15 days) of standby time. I fully charged the phone on Sat. night and it die on me on Sunday afternoon. Without even a low battery warning (like my old phone). I did not even have time to try any other features yet, I am returning this one..

Reviews.Title: Recommended!
Reviews.Author: tinyPrince

} } } Length:: 0:54 MinsThis phone is excellent ! I would definitely recommend it. Overall it's a pretty girly phone, however if you change some of the settings it makes for a cool quirky phone. My only problems with it is that you have to use the headphones that come with the phone, it has no headphone jack. I think a shortcut button to the message center would be nice too, so you don't have to go through the whole menu. The internet runs fast on 3G network. I couldn't like this phone anymore than I already do !

Reviews.Title: Exactly as Promised
Reviews.Author: ssamdy45
Reviews.Content: Cute, easy, fun and great price. Really impressed and happy to get such a good phone at such a good price. If you just want a normal phone, with a big screen and buttons, to make calls and take pics of your cats - this is it. Not everyone wants to spend a zillion bucks for some over-hyped, high gloss, fish frying, atom splitting, over app'd mutil doo hickey, meant to impress folks you don't like who don't know you exist - phone. Great for younger and more mature folks.

Reviews.Title: Ok not great
Reviews.Author: redmatrix06 "retrogamer"
Reviews.Content: My att phone got water damaged.  I left it in my pants pocket and got washed.  I did not wanted to get another phone with ATT and restart my contract.  Especially being close to the termination date. I bought this phone and transferred my sim card.  It works, does not let you do a lot of home screen customization.  Played mp3 and midi files great.  The light effects are nice.

Reviews.Title: Glad we got it.
Reviews.Author: pwnelson
Reviews.Content: My wife's old phone was biting the bullet so found this LG GD570 dLite online,but unable to find it in the T-Mobile stores, supposedly discontinued.We got the lollipop blue.  She like the different features.  She is still learning about all the features.  She just thinks it is COOL.  When we ordered it we were worried that it wouldn't show up at all. This was our first purchase through Amazon.com, but as you can tell everything worked out just fine.  In fact we have ordered some accessories and they have arrived on time too.  Thanks for your service.

Reviews.Title: Lollipop
Reviews.Author: Sasy36
Reviews.Content: It came today(Though I have to get it by my self at the post office just like PO BOX anyway.)Sim card: I using At&t;, after I get a hand on this phone I put the sim card in right away and yeah! It's works! I was worrying because of the T-mobile logo on this phone and I'm living in Kauai-Hawaii the T-mobile won't work here.Package was badly torn out but I felt relief after I opened it and everything was fine, like it so far though the phone look a bit like has somebody used before, but maybe because of the factory tested before ship it to me, and I'm kinda a little bit regretted since I just realized there is also the 2nd generation of this phone that selling on e-bay too :/.Overall:5/5 *will see if there is any cons*

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Neng Vang "Neng2012"
Reviews.Content: Order Placed: May 23, 2011 June 2, 2011 Shipped slow for me, but i got it anyway. This phone is the best one for the price that you can get. if you like get it a try.Max. 400 characters, no HTML  Characters remaining: 233

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Minori
Reviews.Content: I just got this phone today, and so far love it.  I'm using it on AT&T; and have no problems so far. My only issue is that it takes 10-15 seconds to turn on after I trigger the power on, but it's something I'm not too concerned about.  I am very satisfied with this seller.  The phone came in earlier than anticipated, and there were no damages or parts missing in the package.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: P. Johnston
Reviews.Content: This cell phone is the best one I've ever had. I love it. Works great, and has all the features I like.

Reviews.Title: A real conversation piece.
Reviews.Author: 2wimps
Reviews.Content: I purchased the LG GD570 dLite Lollipop Unlocked GSM Quad-Band Cell Phone as a present for my daughter-in-law when the cell phone she was using went ka-put. She is very happy with her new phone and would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: LG GD570 Phone
Reviews.Author: Norseman
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for a couple of months. I waited to really check it out before reviewing. I am not a young person (chronically anyway,(60), my wife would say 16 mentally) and all I wanted was a phone for calls and text. This phone does it all very well at a very good price. I use AT&T;, so all I had to do was insert the SIM and turn it on. Some had reviewed this phone as slow to start up. True...maybe 30 seconds or so. But for me, no problem. It has great reception and headset volume is really good. Speaker phone is also plenty loud. A feature I really liked was the "Favorites Tabs" Enter a phone number and their picture, the center button is "favorites" then scroll thru the pictures and hit the call button. And if this is the last feature you used, it is on the phone when you open it up. It shows up like a spread stack of cards with the person's picture on them. Scroll left or right to go thru the pictures and hit the green button to call. The camera takes good pictures and the blue tooth works fine. This phone also has a memory card slot (mini-SD).The only problem I had was, I can't send or receive pictures on the ATT network. I have not looked into a fix because it isn't important to me. I stopped into the T-Mobile store before I bought this phone, just to look at it. $178(their price) and I would have to get it unlocked myself. Amazon is a much better deal at $78 already unlocked and free shipping. The phone operating system is fast as well, no lag. I highly recommend this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: A good phone for old folks
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my mom after her phone was water-damaged (and before her AT&T; contract would let her get a deal on a new phone).  I just slipped her SIM card out of the damaged phone and into this one...works great!  It gets excellent reception, the menus are intuitive and easy to navigate, the font can be adjusted to LARGE(!), and it's a really cool color.  The best part about this phone, though, is the LED lights that flash at the end of the phone when someone calls.  These are programmable to flash a color you select when certain folks call.  I programmed it to flash red for people my mom doesn't like to talk to, and green and blue for folks she does like to talk to.  She loves it.I think I'm done with the cell phone contract waiting game where you have to wait until your eligible for a new phone and then sign yet another 2 year contract.  I'll be buying phones from Amazon more often.

Reviews.Title: Not good company...
Reviews.Author: Phinella
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for the last 5 yrs,works great,not really into the smart phone craze,only phone I really love as far as flip phones go. Am actually trying to find a back up,cos It dropped on the floor and cracked,I always have a back up.Needless to say this review is about this company not the phone,(5 stars all the way for the phone). Now I got an email from this seller that this phone didn't come in its original box and was missing the headphones,why is it listed as a new phone???  I quickly wrote back to get my refund,the one star is for the courtesy of the email they sent me.

Reviews.Title: nice phon
Reviews.Author: Um khaled
Reviews.Content: my sister's loved it so much , it's so cute and girlyi realy recemmende it to othersmaybe i'll get another one

Reviews.Title: It's so pretty!
Reviews.Author: Dotty Carr
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. T he color makes it easy to spot when you are looking for it. It is also very simple towork.

Reviews.Title: I love this phone
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This phone is very animated and I love it. I like to collect phones. People say that my phone is very coo, because they wouldnt expect my phone to have led lights in the front because looking at it it just looks plain flip phone but once you pushed a button led lights comes on tye screen

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Shah
Reviews.Content: This phone was a buy for my mother. She absolutely loved this little guy! Been almost two years and she still doesn't want another phone! lol

Reviews.Title: phone is great but..
Reviews.Author: Koi
Reviews.Content: The phone had a very slight scratch in the back. I wouldn't have noticed it but my boyfriend is very particular and put the phone together for me when it arrived. Also tter were TONS of phone numbers already on the phone. Numbers from ppl over seas etc. I just deleted them all but something tells me phone might have been used? Otherwise why so many numbers???Phone is super cute and you can personalize everything from lights color to the animation on the outside of the phone. The camera is pretty good too I took some pretty nice pictures yesterday of my boyfriend. the screen is huge in the buttons are my size so it's easy to send messages and browse internet. also I played wIth It all last nIght because of all the personalization :P and today have been textIng and taking photos, only saw one bar go down which Is great because seems lIke battery will last a long time so don't have to charge so much, but not sure about constant phone calls or playing music I don't usually make phone calls anns haven't downloaded any music yet. I would suggest this phone to anyone but maybe not necessarily this buyer only because phone had other ppls numbers amd slight scratch so idk if new. I really hope it lasts.

Reviews.Title: love my lg dlite
Reviews.Author: wendy j caira
Reviews.Content: have had this phone for a few months now-and i am enjoying it immensely-i get better coverage than i did with my old phone! and it is simply a fun phone to have not to mention attractive!!

Reviews.Title: Nice phone, didn't like it's layout
Reviews.Author: TRJ
Reviews.Content: Shipped as-advertised and came quickly. Thing is, I just didn't like the phone itself. The screen saver, wall paper and menus were limited and all looked like a child' room or something? Anyway, phone worked as expected, but I sold it quickly for the juvenile "themes" that couldn't be changed.

Reviews.Title: LG GD570 dLite Lollipop Unlocked GSM QuadBand Cell Phone with 2 MP Camera, Bluetooth, and MP3 Player--No Warranty (Sky Blue
Reviews.Author: P. BENDER "phil2246"
Reviews.Content: Love this phone. I think its the best phone I have ever had. Its just a simple phone. Its gopt all the features on it I want. Good reception and good antenna pickup.Its unlocked so I can take it anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone
Reviews.Author: Alex_143
Reviews.Content: The phone is excellent, but only problem is with its GPS... It don't seem to work at all... :( also email configuration is not supported, its saying Data plan not found... but in India we have GPRS plans, which is supposed to be the data plan... Not sure what to do.. Apart from that, the phone is simply awesome...

Reviews.Title: fantastic phone
Reviews.Author: junebee
Reviews.Content: this phone is absolutly great,it is the ideal thing for kids,adult ,and great for older people .have had no problem what so ever ,it is worth every penny

Reviews.Title: Great phone--terrible battery!
Reviews.Author: brick
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for about 3 months now. everything works well and I love this phone. However, the battery was terrible! It tends to die on you after 4 or 5 hours of charging the phone. Maybe the seller got a cheaper battery. Overall this phone works well and it is cute.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money
Reviews.Author: nlwhitehorse
Reviews.Content: Originally wanted the bubblegum pink one, but got this one instead! Very pleased with the price and product. Came in less than a week. Over all, it works great and has the cutest little graphics. I needed a nicer phone that was unlocked and quadband so I can use it while I'm in Germany and then use it for when I'm in the states too. It's not a touch screen phone or whatever, but it's pretty nice for a flip phone!

Reviews.Title: My first LG
Reviews.Author: Alix
Reviews.Content: I really like all the feature this phone provides. It could be great with a proper configuration. I'm really happy so far~But this the thing, even though internet is not my priority, I would like to know if there's a chance I can have access to the web browser. I live in Venezuela, can I configure it to work?

Reviews.Title: Initial impression is good. No FM radio as advertised.
Reviews.Author: horus
Reviews.Content: Just unpacked my dLite. Still learning the menu. I like the feel of the phone. Nice big screen.I am disappointed that FM radio is not present in the dLite, as advertised.FM radio was present in the original Korean LG Lollipop.

Reviews.Title: Yuk
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain
Reviews.Content: I love the look and all, but I got about 2 hours talk time - not enough for a real workhorse phone.  I went and exchanged it - and got the same from the replacement.  So, if you need oomph - this isn't the one.But - it does have lovely features, as the previous peeps have stated.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: mj812
Reviews.Content: This phone's condition was listed as "new." The phone was packaged to look new but it clearly was not. It still contained a previous owners personal pictures and information on it, and the battery would not hold a charge. The battery's stickers were peeling off of it, as if new stickers had been put on in order to give it the appearance of being new. I am very dissapointed with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Pleased!
Reviews.Author: Murdoc829
Reviews.Content: My old Samsung flip-phone stopped keeping a charge worth a darn, so I came to Amazon seeking a replacement. I didn't want a fancy phone -- just something with which to talk and text. i'm not going to lie: This is a pretty silly phone in many ways. It's bright blue, lights up, has super twee wallpaper and ring tone options, etc. That said, it's kind of fun! It also took my Samsung sim card seamlessly (I use AT&T;, not T-Mobile). I did lose my pictures, but I suspect I saved them to the phone instead of the sim card or something. My contacts transferred no problem, and the phone sends and receives calls and texts with no issues. The camera doesn't have a flash, so trying to take a pic in a dark room doesn't work out so well, but what true photographer uses a camera phone anyway? I can't speak to the web browser, as I don't have that service. But the menu is easily navigated, the controls are intuitive, the plug also serves as the USB connector for a computer (reducing the number of cords that must be kept up with), and the call quality is high.

Reviews.Title: a great little phone - you can see who's calling while it is in my purse
Reviews.Author: ripp
Reviews.Content: I really like the lite-up digital numbers and name that comes across the front of the phone - it's unique

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: the costumer 136
Reviews.Content: excelente compra , rápido el envío, el teléfono funciona perfectamente en Venezuela con todas las operadoras, lo recomiendo a todos los latinos que viven fuera de los Estados Unidos.

Reviews.Title: For ages 1-3
Reviews.Author: Older shopper
Reviews.Content: This was not at all what I tought i'd be.  The displays were childish, not replaceable by internet connections, and limited in number. I returned the item as soon as I could. Very displeased! I would not even rate this a one star.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
3G-enabled flip phone in electric blue with unique LED matrix on the cover and customizable edge-lit LED light colors
Compatible with T-Mobile's 3G network for fast downloads as well as quick uploads of photo and video to sharing sites
2.0-megapixel camera/camcorder, Bluetooth stereo music, microSD memory expansion to 16 GB, organizer tools, personal e-mail, GPS-enabled
Up to 5.5 hours of talk time, up to 360 hours (15 days) of standby time, released in July, 2010
2.0-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD memory expansion to 16 GB; organizer tools; personal e-mail; GPS-enabled
It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.

ProductInfo.Name: LG GD570 dLite Lollipop Unlocked GSM QuadBand Cell Phone with 2 MP Camera, Bluetooth, and MP3 Player--No Warranty (Sky Blue)
